title: Bowers & Wilkins debuts Zeppelin Wireless, adding Bluetooth and power to iconic Apple speaker
text:
Bowers & Wilkins debuts Zeppelin Wireless, adding Bluetooth and power to iconic Apple speaker 
Published By: 9to5mac.com - Today 
Bowers & Wilkins, maker of the iconic Zeppelin speaker and its AirPlay sequel Zeppelin Air, today announced an upgraded model with even mor... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
